com.service.service.rest.client

Interface IServiceAccessAnotherServiceClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceAccessAnotherServiceClientImpl

    public interface IServiceAccessAnotherServiceClient
    This interface provides the functionality to create Transfer Data over the secure connection established independent of the User
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> contactAnotherService(java.lang.String url, ConnectionManagerImpl.RequestMethod requestMethod, ConnectionManagerImpl.ContentType contentType, java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String serviceSessionID, ServiceSession serviceSession, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> requestData)
      This method creates an AppAccessServiceReuqest over a secure connection which could be used to transfer data between applications.

    • Method Detail

      • contactAnotherService

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> contactAnotherService(java.lang.String url,
                                                                     ConnectionManagerImpl.RequestMethod requestMethod,
                                                                     ConnectionManagerImpl.ContentType contentType,
                                                                     java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                                     java.lang.String serviceSessionID,
                                                                     ServiceSession serviceSession,
                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> requestData)
                                                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                              AuthenticatorValidationException,
                                                                              InternalSystemException
        This method creates an AppAccessServiceReuqest over a secure connection which could be used to transfer data between applications. It requires the Client Application has been authenticated by the Serving Application
        Parameters:
        url - String URL of the Web service of the Service Application
        requestMethod - com.service.util.connectionmanager.ConnectionManagerImpl.RequestMethod Type of method to be used to contact the web service
        contentType: - Content Type to be used to contact the web service com.service.util.connectionmanager.ConnectionManagerImpl.ContentType Type of content to be used to contact the web service
        serviceName - String UID of the application being accessed
        serviceSessionID - String Kerberos Service Session ID created by the kerberos for the connection between the service application
        serviceSession - ServiceSession Session created by the application being contacted
        requestData - Map Data to be send to the other service application
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case there are some errors encountered while retrieving information
        AuthenticatorValidationException - In case the Authenticator fail to validate
        InternalSystemException - In case there are errors encountered on the Server Side
